abstract: Ottawa Senators hire Guy Boucher as head coach.

headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Hockey; Senators Name New Coach
headline.main: Senators Name Guy Boucher as Coach

snippet: Boucher, 44, became the 12th coach in Senators history, replacing Dave Cameron, who was fired on April 12.
lead_paragraph: Boucher, 44, became the 12th coach in Senators history, replacing Dave Cameron, who was fired on April 12.
